My firecrackers for beginning of the year of ox 2009

Posted on January 27, 2009


爆竹声声辞旧岁
火树银花迎金牛


In childhood, I was playing firecrackers everyday in the Spring Festival. The new year’s eve is the only chance for me to lit it again,  I felt I like a 10 years child.
